name: Rapiscan Systems Ltd
goal: Rapiscan Systems designs, develops and manufactures physical security equipment. Equipment includes x-ray systems, metal detectors, explosive detection systems, CBRNE detection equipment. Equipment is used in a number of applications including: aviation security, landside security screening, protection of critical infrastructure protection of public spaces, loss prevention, military force protection. The company goal is to become a leading supplier in this type of equipment and provide security to the public.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Customs, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Rapiscan has a particular interest in aviation security regulation, landside security regulation and policy, the proposal for the certification of aviation security equipment, maritime security, customs and border protection, explosives and drugs precursor regulations, explosives legislation, CBRNE initiatives
